name: Don't look at Greg
description:
Don't look at Greg.

WASD to move.

Left click to interact & pick apples.

Hold right click to center mouse.

Shift to run.

Jam entry - Made in a weekend for Ludum Dare 41.

4-24: Small bug fix. Adjusted mouse cursor and squashed a bug where Greg speed carried over on retries (ultra hard mode)

4-25: Adjusted difficulty on lvl2
